title: Drawing, Design for Column Capital for July Festival Architecture, 1835
title_raw: Design for Column Capital for July Festival Architecture
medium: Brush and watercolor, gouache, black wash, graphite on dark cream paper mounted on off-white laid paper
inscribed: (by a later hand) lower margin of mount in graphite: Fêtes de Juillet 1835.
dimensions:
sheet:  7 3/8 x 8 3/4 inches (18.7 x 22.2 inches)
mount:  11 3/8 x 17 1/2 inches (28.8 x 44.4 cm)
Mat:  35.6 x 45.7 cm (14 x 18 in.)
description: Design for a square panel in yellow on red ground.  Circular scalloped field filled with concentric circles of gold rings around a blue square at center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Column Capital for July Festival Architecture, 1835. Brush and watercolor, gouache, black wash, graphite on dark cream paper mounted on off-white laid paper. 
1991-17-12
